item.title: United States and Canada Twilio SMS and MMS Maintenance
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 25, 20:00 PST -  Nov 26, 00:00 PST

Oct 6, 11:27 PDT
Scheduled - Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 November 2025 at 20:00 PST until 26 November 2025 at 00:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays or failures delivering SMS and MMS to and from United States and Canada handsets via subset of long codes, short codes and toll free numbers.

item.title: United States MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 4, 00:00 - 02:00 PST

Oct 16, 12:19 PDT
Scheduled - Our MMS carrier partner in the United States is conducting a planned maintenance from 04 November 2025 at 00:00 PST until 04 November 2025 at 02:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to United States handsets via United States short codes.
